TextData.SourceString: Pick up items with <keyGuideIcon id=|Interact_1|/>.
TextData.LocalizedString: Pick up items with <keyGuideIcon id=|Interact_1|/>.

TextData.SourceString: Open the Build Menu with <keyGuideIcon id=|OpenConstructionRadialMenu|/>.
TextData.LocalizedString: Open the Build Menu with <keyGuideIcon id=|OpenConstructionRadialMenu|/>.

TextData.SourceString:
Press <keyGuideIcon id=|ThrowObject|/> to throw a Sphere and capture a Pal.
Weakened Pals are easier to catch.
TextData.LocalizedString:
Press <keyGuideIcon id=|ThrowObject|/> to throw a Sphere and capture a Pal.
Weakened Pals are easier to catch.

TextData.SourceString:
Use <keyGuideIcon id=|OpenConstructionRadialMenu|/> to build a Palbox
from the Build Menu and construct a base.
TextData.LocalizedString:
Use <keyGuideIcon id=|OpenConstructionRadialMenu|/> to build a Palbox
from the Build Menu and construct a base.

TextData.SourceString:
Use a Skill Fruit from your inventory
to learn a Pal skill.
TextData.LocalizedString:
Use a Skill Fruit from your inventory
to learn a Pal skill.

TextData.SourceString:
Collect <itemName id=|Relic|/> and offer them to a <MapObjectName id=|BuildableGoddessStatue|/>
to improve your ability to capture Pals.
TextData.LocalizedString:
Collect <itemName id=|Relic|/> and offer them to a <MapObjectName id=|BuildableGoddessStatue|/>
to improve your ability to capture Pals.

TextData.SourceString: Press <keyGuideIcon id=|Jump|/> while jumping to glide.
TextData.LocalizedString: Press <keyGuideIcon id=|Jump|/> while jumping to glide.

TextData.SourceString:
Build an <MapObjectName id=|HatchingPalEgg|/>
to incubate Pal eggs.
TextData.LocalizedString:
Build an <MapObjectName id=|HatchingPalEgg|/>
to incubate Pal eggs.

TextData.SourceString:
You will be revived at the location
where you build a Palbox.
TextData.LocalizedString:
You will be revived at the location
where you build a Palbox.

TextData.SourceString:
Your Pals and items will be dropped where you were knocked out.
Collect them before someone else does.
TextData.LocalizedString:
Your Pals and items will be dropped where you were knocked out.
Collect them before someone else does.

TextData.SourceString:
Use Technology Points to unlock
new items and facilities.
TextData.LocalizedString:
Use Technology Points to unlock
new items and facilities.

TextData.SourceString:
Press <keyGuideIcon id=|OpenCharacterMenu|/> to open the inventory
and use Status Points to strengthen your character.
TextData.LocalizedString:
Press <keyGuideIcon id=|OpenCharacterMenu|/> to open the inventory
and use Status Points to strengthen your character.

TextData.SourceString:
Your parameters will decrease while hungry.
You can eat by using items in the inventory.
TextData.LocalizedString:
Your parameters will decrease while hungry.
You can eat by using items in the inventory.

TextData.SourceString:
Pal parameters will decrease while hungry.
You can feed them by using items in the inventory.
TextData.LocalizedString:
Pal parameters will decrease while hungry.
You can feed them by using items in the inventory.

TextData.SourceString:
Pals will slack off or get sick if their SAN decreases too much.
Feed them high quality food or build a hot spring to restore SAN.
TextData.LocalizedString:
Pals will slack off or get sick if their SAN decreases too much.
Feed them high quality food or build a hot spring to restore SAN.

TextData.SourceString:
If a Pal falls ill, treat them using medicine
made from a medicine work bench.
TextData.LocalizedString:
If a Pal falls ill, treat them using medicine
made from a medicine work bench.

TextData.SourceString:
Pals' SAN decreases while doing work, causing them to slack off.
Build a hot spring or other facilities to get them back on the job.
TextData.LocalizedString:
Pals' SAN decreases while doing work, causing them to slack off.
Build a hot spring or other facilities to get them back on the job.

TextData.SourceString:
Wild Pals are easier to capture when their <uiCommon id=|COMMON_STATUS_HP|/> is low.
They cannot be captured if you kill them.
TextData.LocalizedString:
Wild Pals are easier to capture when their <uiCommon id=|COMMON_STATUS_HP|/> is low.
They cannot be captured if you kill them.

TextData.SourceString: Press <keyGuideIcon id=|ThrowPal|/> to summon a captured Pal.
TextData.LocalizedString: Press <keyGuideIcon id=|ThrowPal|/> to summon a captured Pal.

TextData.SourceString:
You'll receive a lot of EXP for capturing a new type of Pal.
Search for new Pals as you continue your adventure.
TextData.LocalizedString:
You'll receive a lot of EXP for capturing a new type of Pal.
Search for new Pals as you continue your adventure.

TextData.SourceString:
You'll receive bonus EXP for capturing the same type of Pal
up to ten times.
TextData.LocalizedString:
You'll receive bonus EXP for capturing the same type of Pal
up to ten times.

TextData.SourceString:
You can take up to five Pals with you at a time.
Capture any more than that, and they will automatically be sent to your Palbox.
TextData.LocalizedString:
You can take up to five Pals with you at a time.
Capture any more than that, and they will automatically be sent to your Palbox.

TextData.SourceString:
You've captured a lucky Pal!
See what special abilities they have!
TextData.LocalizedString:
You've captured a lucky Pal!
See what special abilities they have!

TextData.SourceString:
Build a Palbox,
and you can retrieve captured Pals from it.
TextData.LocalizedString:
Build a Palbox,
and you can retrieve captured Pals from it.

TextData.SourceString:
You won't be able to effectively use Pals at a higher level than you!
Their abilities will be lowered to match those of your character's level.
TextData.LocalizedString:
You won't be able to effectively use Pals at a higher level than you!
Their abilities will be lowered to match those of your character's level.

TextData.SourceString:
You won't be able to move if you're carrying too much heavy stuff.
Use Status Points to increase your carrying capacity.
TextData.LocalizedString:
You won't be able to move if you're carrying too much heavy stuff.
Use Status Points to increase your carrying capacity.

TextData.SourceString:
Hand-held torches brighten up areas around you and fend off the cold.
Try crafting one at a workbench.
TextData.LocalizedString:
Hand-held torches brighten up areas around you and fend off the cold.
Try crafting one at a workbench.

TextData.SourceString:
Your Pal has been knocked out!
Place them in a Palbox to heal them of the <uiCommon id=|COMMON_CONDITION_NAME_Dying|/> status.
TextData.LocalizedString:
Your Pal has been knocked out!
Place them in a Palbox to heal them of the <uiCommon id=|COMMON_CONDITION_NAME_Dying|/> status.

TextData.SourceString:
Take out a Pal at base, and they
will automatically search for jobs they are capable of doing.
TextData.LocalizedString:
Take out a Pal at base, and they
will automatically search for jobs they are capable of doing.

TextData.SourceString:
Place a Pal in the Base Pals slot in your Palbox,
and they will help out based on their work suitability
TextData.LocalizedString:
Place a Pal in the Base Pals slot in your Palbox,
and they will help out based on their work suitability

TextData.SourceString:
Pals can equip up to three active skills at once.
Try swapping in new skills from the <uiCommon id=|INGAME_MAIN_MENU_PAL|/> menu.
TextData.LocalizedString:
Pals can equip up to three active skills at once.
Try swapping in new skills from the <uiCommon id=|INGAME_MAIN_MENU_PAL|/> menu.

TextData.SourceString:
Fighting a rampaging wild Pal with your bare hands isn't the best idea.
Try building a workbench and crafting a weapon.
TextData.LocalizedString:
Fighting a rampaging wild Pal with your bare hands isn't the best idea.
Try building a workbench and crafting a weapon.

TextData.SourceString:
You've found a note from another adventurer.
You can check their journeys from the option screen.
TextData.LocalizedString:
You've found a note from another adventurer.
You can check their journeys from the option screen.
